title: LoL Friends app how to move friend groups
body: I'm wondering if i can move friend groups up and down in LoL Friends, i don't see an option anywhere and changing it on desktop does not seem to affect it on the app. If this feature is not included in the app i would love to see Riot add it in the future.

replies.body:
This doesn't seem to be a feature at the moment (just tried it on my phone), so it's a great suggestion! To ensure this is seen by the right part of the community, I recommend posting this to the [Mobile App Discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/mobile-app-discussion) section of the boards.

Let me know if you have any questions!
